name: Rander Ceramic Stool - Spruce Green/White
description: With stripes reminiscent of a traditional peppermint humbug, our reimagined spruce and white-striped Rander Ceramic Stool adds a playful touch wherever it is placed. This handmade ceramic piece is incredibly versatile, too – it can be commandeered for extra seating in the sitting room or as a makeshift table in the garden. Due to the artisanal techniques used, each piece will show individual characteristics.
